examples.example: 在那片肥沃的土地上，有着一亩长势喜人的庄稼。

translate.english: On that fertile land, there is one mu of thriving crops.

examples.example: 他在山脚下开辟了一亩美丽的花园，里面种满了各种鲜花。

translate.english: He opened up a beautiful one-acre garden at the foot of the mountain, which is full of all kinds of flowers.

examples.example: 我们家有一亩小菜园，里面种满了各种新鲜的蔬菜，让人看了满心欢喜。

translate.english: Our family has a small vegetable garden of one mu, which is full of all kinds of fresh vegetables, making people feel full of joy when looking at it.
